tika-vin02t39:1_1: If a legal issue is reopening, they reopen it, and ruin it, thinking: ‘This is a disciplinary issue, turns out to have reopened a wall, but why don’t said it.’
tika-vin02t39:2_0: Right away he practiced the army, cleared himself, and the path to teach Dhamma.
tika-vin02t39:2_1: Because of barley oil lamps, the boiled finest.
tika-vin02t39:2_2: Is the aggregates and delight in the aggregates.
tika-vin02t39:3_0: Because of accumulation, they transgress in the past, with the previous set.
tika-vin02t39:4_0: this is their sufficient, this is the legal issue arising from a dispute.
tika-vin02t39:5_0: Then, when they had appointed, they give disciplinary issues. When they have spoken, they don’t consent to, and they don’t fulfill their duties. And they don’t fall down on their business.
tika-vin02t39:6_1: ‘That’s why your main house are blown out.’
tika-vin02t39:6_2: Removing resolution through recollection or face-to-face, face-to-face with the Teaching, face-to-face, face-to-face with the Sangha.
